resources.string: The objective of I\'m Driving is to prevent you from using your SmartPhone while driving. This Application is based on Oprah Winfrey\'s No Phone Zone Pledge.
To know more about what No Phone Zone is and what it means, please visit the official site:
Visit the official site and Sign the Pledge
The text below will be sent in response to all SMS/Calls while this app is running.
I\'m driving right now, I\'ll reply when possible.
If checked, you\'ll get no audio/haptic warning that you received a message/call. (recommended)
If checked, the automatic reply SMS will be sent only to numbers on your contacts. (recommended)
If checked, no more than 1 message per hour will be sent to the same number, while the application is active. (recommended)
Reply Only to Contacts mode ON
Reply Only to Contacts mode OFF
Here you can find a list of some great folks who helped make this application possible. Please take a moment to visit their Websites. Click on the logos to do so.
All trademarks are copyright of their respective owners\n\nNot officially supported by Oprah Winfrey
Sent using I\'m Driving by Wozia

Please be aware that every SMS reply sent will be charged by your operator accordingly.

The reply message length can vary according to user language (English adds 31 chars), default reply message and if your current address is sent with the reply (for users in Private Group, full address is sent).

Please Drive Safely.

All trademarks are copyright of their respective owners

Not officially supported by Oprah Winfrey
Exit the app using the menu.
